title: GRAPENT Pull On Womens Jeans Baggy Stretchy High Waisted Denim Wide Leg Trouser Pants Trendy Front Seam 90s Loose Jean
description: Inseam of the womens jeans: 30". This pair of denim pants has elastic high waist design creating a flattering silhouette by accentuating the waist and elongating the legs. The front seam adds a distinctive and fashionable element to the jeans.

These jeans for women high waist with the baggy wide leg layout help to conceal any body imgoodions or areas you may feel self-conscious about. They provide a relaxed and forgiving silhouette that flatters different body types.

Pull on closure of the women jeans is effortless for you to put on and take off without the need to struggle with buttons or deal with zipper malfunctions. Five functional pockets allow for convenient access to frequently used items.
Our trousers for women high waisted are made of stretchy, skin-friendly and denim fabric, letting you feel comfortable and pleasant to wear for the whole day.

GRAPENT tummy control jeans for women run true to standard US sizes. Size X-Small fits size 0 to size 2, Size Small fits size 4 to size 6, Size Medium fits size 8 to size 10, Size Large fits size 12 to size 14, Size X-Large fits size 16 to size 18, Size XX-Large fits size 20 to size 22.
